abilities.name: Sparkling Ripples
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Aqua Swirl
attacks.text: You may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
